author: MSNBC.com
title: Rep. Shalala: As COVID-19 spikes, people in Florida are ‘frightened to death'
description: Rep. Donna Shalala on the massive coronavirus outbreak in Florida: “It’s a disaster. It’s a catastrophic failure of leadership—of our governor, of our President.”

author: Msnbc
title: Chris Hayes calls for Trump to resign: 'Urgent matter of public health, public safety’
description: Chris Hayes on why Trump must resign: “If this presidency had creditors, the virus' resurgence this week would have been a default event. Only it is not his creditors who are suffering. It is us.”
source.name: MSNBC

author: MPX
title: Hayes: Amid coronavirus surge, U.S. stuck with ‘same horrible...
description: Chris Hayes: “We could have gone through door number three. We could have found our way to some form of normal life. But our leaders did not do what was necessary to get there. So, we are stuck…back with the same horrible choice we had fourteen weeks ago.”
source.name: MSNBC

title: Trump vows to protect pre-existing conditions despite action to overturn Obamacare

title: NYT reporter covering Russia’s bounty on US troops gives analysis
